settings.title: Our Mission
settings.content: At Lucky Paws, our mission is to provide fun, creative, and safe pet products. Our pet bottles are eco-friendly, nontoxic, and functional in design.

settings.title: GET 10% OFF YOUR FIRST PURCHASE!
settings.newsletter_text: Join the team and be the first to know about new product and special promotions. By clicking on “Sign Up”, you agree to receive marketing emails and have read and agree to our Privacy and Cookie Policy and Terms of Use.

settings.title: OUR STORY
settings.content:
At Lucky Paws, our mission is to provide pet products that are fun, creative, and safe for your pet. We offer three styles of pet water bottles for all of your hydration needs on-the-go. Each product has been tested by our expert team, and we're confident you'll like them as much as we do. We believe that bringing joy to pets is important, because they’re a member of the family too!

We support our local shelters year-round; a portion of every sale is donated towards helping shelters care for less fortunate animals. Our current donation recipient is the Animal Rescue League of Boston - you can find out more here.

settings.title: leak proof Design
settings.text: Our pet bottles are designed with a silica gel seal to prevent leaks. Carry them around in your bag without ever worrying about a spill!

settings.title: High quality Material
settings.text: We take pride in the quality of our product. Only highest quality materials are used in the manufacturing process. Rest assured our pet bottles are 100% safe for your pet.

settings.title: build for comfort
settings.text: Our pet bottles were designed with comfort in mind. We make sure that our product is easy to use for both your and your pet.

settings.richtext_top: Add description, images, menus and links to your mega menu
A column with no settings can be used as a spacer
Link to your collections, sales and even external links

settings.title: Never waste another drop!
settings.content: Our LuckyPaw Original Pet Bottle is the easiest way to keep your pets hydrated. All you have to do is fill the water bottle before you go out with your dog, unlock the nozzle with the unlock button when your dog is thirsty, and hold down the dispense button giving your dog access to the water it needs. This process is 100x easier than having to take out your bowl, pour water into it, and putting the wet bowl back into your backpack.

settings.title: Portability without sacrificing functionality
settings.content: Our LuckyPaw Mini Pet Bottle is the easiest way to keep your pets hydrated. All you have to do is fill the water bottle before you go out with your dog, unlock the nozzle with the unlock button when your dog is thirsty, and hold down the dispense button giving your dog access to the water it needs. This process is 100x easier than having to take out your bowl, pour water into it, and putting the wet bowl back into your backpack.

settings.text: CONTACT US FOR ANYTHING AT ALL! WE WILL TRY OUR BEST TO GET BACK TO YOU WITHIN 1-2 BUSINESS DAYS. IF YOU HAVE PLACED AN ORDER AND NEED TO CHANGE YOUR ADDRESS PLEASE PUT "URGENT - ADDRESS CHANGE" IN YOUR SUBJECT TITLE!
